==Trivia==
* Mika's Test Run is the first non-solo Test Run to consist entirely of characters who were not either permanently obtainable for free (Amber, Barbara, Collei, Kaeya, Lisa, and Xiangling as of Version 3.5<!-- don't include later characters like Lynette -->) or guaranteed via the [[Beginners' Wish]] (Noelle).
